timeline.bodyText: Different license header for this file versus the one used for https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly/blob/fd49d11fda103a82282c857c3dad451b8b44a598/testsuite/integration/elytron/src/test/java/org/wildfly/test/integration/elytron/realm/FailoverRealmTestCase.java is intentional?
timeline.author: jstourac
